text: evanukkut tiya kariyankal alakakak kanpikkappattu avanum atai alakakak kankirano avana (tiyatai tiyatakave kantu atiliruntu vilakik kolkiravanaip ponru avan)? (Oru potum aka mattan.) Niccayamaka allah tan virumpiyavarkalait tavarana valiyil vittu vitukiran. Tan virumpiyavarkalai nerana valiyil celuttukiran. Akave, (napiye!) Avarkalukkaka umatu uyiraiye mayttuk kollum alavukku nir kavalaippatatir. Niccayamaka allah avarkal ceypavarrai nankarikiran
